Name: Heavy Weapon Deluxe
About the game: It's shoot-'em-up arcade action at its best! Use an incredible assortment of heavy artillery to blast away enemy tanks and planes, and fight your way to victory. What are you waiting for? Pull yourself up by your bootstraps and get into the action! Blast your way through 19 missions packed with peril. Two action-packed game modes: Mission and Survival. Enhanced sound effects and an original soundtrack!
